scripts.preintegration-test: docker build --force-rm -t tschaible/slack-weather:integration-test . && docker run -e OPENWEATHERMAP_API_KEY=$OPENWEATHERMAP_API_KEY -d -p 6789:3000 --label environment=integration_test tschaible/slack-weather:integration-test && sleep 5
scripts.postintegration-test: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q --filter 'label=environment=integration_test'); docker rm $(docker ps -a -q --filter 'label=environment=integration_test')
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
